Title: Scrappy Straggler
Description:
If someone got left behind, we need to do something about that.

I hate to say it, but these people need someone to protect them here. I have to stay.

Find this straggler. And while you're at it, take a peek behind enemy lines. See if you can find anything useful.
CompletionText: The others all made it to safety, right?
RewardText:
I definitely had everything under control.

<Flynn winces.>

But... I'll admit, this venom is dulling my otherwise lightning-quick reflexes, $n.
